query.statement: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, SELLER_ID, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, AS_YN, SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_AMOUNT, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE ) VALUES (:vo.prodNo, :vo.prodName, :vo.sellerId, :vo.prodDetail, :vo.manufactureDay, :vo.asYn, :vo.sellQuantity, :vo.sellAmount, :vo.imageFile, sysdate)

UPDATE PRODUCT SET PROD_NAME = :vo.ProdName, PROD_DETAIL = :vo.prodDetail, MANUFACTURE_DAY = :vo.manufactureDay, AS_YN = :vo.asYn, SELL_QUANTITY = :vo.sellQuantity, SELL_AMOUNT = :vo.sellAmount, REG_DATE = sysdate WHERE PROD_NO = :vo.ProdNo
SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, SELLER_ID, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, AS_YN, SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_AMOUNT, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PROD_NO = :vo.ProdNo

SELECT product.PROD_NO, product.PROD_NAME, product.SELLER_ID, product.PROD_DETAIL, product.MANUFACTURE_DAY, product.AS_YN, product.SELL_QUANTITY, product.SELL_AMOUNT, product.IMAGE_FILE, product.REG_DATE FROM PRODUCT product WHERE product.PROD_NAME like :vo.prodName AND product.AS_YN = :vo.asYn ORDER BY product.PROD_NO DESC
